content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":145481,"originalJapaneseLine":"　女の子同士なんてもったいないからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's a waste for it to be just between girls.\""},{"lineNumber":145482,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……レズ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Lesbian?\""},{"lineNumber":145483,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿なことを謙信様に言わないで下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please don't say such foolish things to Lord Kenshin.\""},{"lineNumber":145484,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおっ、愛ちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, Ai-chan.\""},{"lineNumber":145485,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気配もなく後ろに立つんじゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't stand behind me without any sign.\""},{"lineNumber":145486,"originalJapaneseLine":"「愛、ただいま」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ai, I'm home.\""},{"lineNumber":145487,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、お帰りなさい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm, welcome back.\""},{"lineNumber":145488,"originalJapaneseLine":"　怪我もないようで安心したわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm relieved you don't seem to be injured.\""},{"lineNumber":145489,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こちらの様子はどうだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How are things over here?\""},{"lineNumber":145490,"originalJapaneseLine":"「毎日最前線で戦ってるわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We're fighting on the front lines every day.\""},{"lineNumber":145491,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝子も虎子も頑張ってるしね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Katsuko and Torako are doing their best too.\""},{"lineNumber":145492,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、はいはい！　虎子がんばってます！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, yes yes! Torako's doing her best!\""},{"lineNumber":145493,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっと黙ってなさいよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, be quiet for a moment...\""},{"lineNumber":145494,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただ……敵の数は減らないので、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... since the number of enemies doesn't decrease,\""},{"lineNumber":145495,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆、疲労が溜まっています」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"everyone is getting fatigued.\""},{"lineNumber":145496,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今回は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This time...\""},{"lineNumber":145497,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人ケッセルリンクと戦うんですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"we're going to fight the demon Kesselring, right?\""},{"lineNumber":145498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「謙信様、頑張って下さい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Kenshin, please do your best!\""},{"lineNumber":145499,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっと謙信様なら出来ます！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm sure if it's Lord Kenshin, you can do it!\""},{"lineNumber":145500,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こら、倒すのは俺様だぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, I'm the one who's going to defeat him.\""},{"lineNumber":145501,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……良かった、まだ皆元気そうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Good, everyone still seems well.\""},{"lineNumber":145502,"originalJapaneseLine":"「謙信も心配だったのでしょうけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kenshin was worried, of course, but\""},{"lineNumber":145503,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うちの子達も謙信のことは心配してたから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"our kids were worried about Kenshin too,\""},{"lineNumber":145504,"originalJapaneseLine":"　顔を出してくれて良かったわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"so I'm glad you came to see us.\""},{"lineNumber":145505,"originalJapaneseLine":"「特に勝子は毎日、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Especially Katsuko, who every day,"},{"lineNumber":145506,"originalJapaneseLine":"　謙信のことばかり言ってたから」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"kept talking about Kenshin.\""},{"lineNumber":145507,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか、勝子。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, Katsuko."},{"lineNumber":145508,"originalJapaneseLine":"　心配してくれていたのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Did you worry about me?\""},{"lineNumber":145509,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes...\""},{"lineNumber":145510,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クマの耳……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bear ears...\""},{"lineNumber":145511,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クマれす、クマれす」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kuma-resu, Kuma-resu.\" (Note: playful bear-sounding words)"},{"lineNumber":145512,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クマクマ♪　クマクマ♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kuma Kuma♪ Kuma Kuma♪\" (bear bear sounds)"},{"lineNumber":145513,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クマじゃなくて虎だから！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm not a bear, I'm a tiger!\""},{"lineNumber":145514,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あっち行きなさい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Go over there!\""},{"lineNumber":145515,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がおー！　ほら、がおー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gao~! See, gao~!\" (tiger growl sounds)"},{"lineNumber":145516,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がおー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gao~!\""},{"lineNumber":145517,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がおーれす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gaore-su!\" (playful growl with cute suffix)"},{"lineNumber":145518,"originalJapaneseLine":"「真似された！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You copied me!?\""},{"lineNumber":145519,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっと静かにしてなさい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, be quiet for a moment!\""},{"lineNumber":145520,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃいん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kya-in!\" (a small startled or pained sound)"},{"lineNumber":145521,"originalJapaneseLine":"「勝子」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Katsuko\""},{"lineNumber":145522,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、こほん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ahem...\""},{"lineNumber":145523,"originalJapaneseLine":"照れ隠しに咳払いをしてから","translatedEnglishLine":"After clearing her throat to hide her embarrassment,"},{"lineNumber":145524,"originalJapaneseLine":"改めて勝子が謙信に向き直る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Katsuko faced Kenshin again."},{"lineNumber":145525,"originalJapaneseLine":"「謙信様、ご心配をおかけして申し訳ありません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Kenshin, I apologize for causing you worry.\""},{"lineNumber":145526,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お会い出来たことも嬉しく思います」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am also glad to have been able to meet you.\""},{"lineNumber":145527,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm.\""},{"lineNumber":145528,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ですが、どうか、謙信様は謙信様の戦いを」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But please, Lord Kenshin, fight your own battle.\""},{"lineNumber":145529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私達なら大丈夫です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We will be fine.\""},{"lineNumber":145530,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ふーん……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hmm...)"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子同士なんてもったいないからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a waste for it to be just between girls."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬鹿なことを謙信様に言わないで下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please don't say such foolish things to Lord Kenshin."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気配もなく後ろに立つんじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't stand behind me without any sign."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怪我もないようで安心したわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm relieved you don't seem to be injured."
"We're fighting on the front lines every day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝子も虎子も頑張ってるしね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Katsuko and Torako are doing their best too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、はいはい！　虎子がんばってます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, yes yes! Torako's doing her best!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ……敵の数は減らないので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... since the number of enemies doesn't decrease,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆、疲労が溜まっています」
魔人ケッセルリンクと戦うんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "we're going to fight the demon Kesselring, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと謙信様なら出来ます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm sure if it's Lord Kenshin, you can do it!"
"Hey, I'm the one who's going to defeat him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……良かった、まだ皆元気そうだ」
「謙信も心配だったのでしょうけど、
うちの子達も謙信のことは心配してたから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "our kids were worried about Kenshin too,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔を出してくれて良かったわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "so I'm glad you came to see us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信のことばかり言ってたから」
心配してくれていたのか」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not a bear, I'm a tiger!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がおー！　ほら、がおー！」
「ちょっと静かにしてなさい！」
照れ隠しに咳払いをしてから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After clearing her throat to hide her embarrassment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 改めて勝子が謙信に向き直る。
「謙信様、ご心配をおかけして申し訳ありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Kenshin, I apologize for causing you worry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お会い出来たことも嬉しく思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am also glad to have been able to meet you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですが、どうか、謙信様は謙信様の戦いを」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But please, Lord Kenshin, fight your own battle."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a waste for it to be just between girls."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬鹿なことを謙信様に言わないで下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please don't say such foolish things to Lord Kenshin."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気配もなく後ろに立つんじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't stand behind me without any sign."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怪我もないようで安心したわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm relieved you don't seem to be injured."
"We're fighting on the front lines every day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝子も虎子も頑張ってるしね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Katsuko and Torako are doing their best too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、はいはい！　虎子がんばってます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, yes yes! Torako's doing her best!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ……敵の数は減らないので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... since the number of enemies doesn't decrease,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆、疲労が溜まっています」
魔人ケッセルリンクと戦うんですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "we're going to fight the demon Kesselring, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと謙信様なら出来ます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm sure if it's Lord Kenshin, you can do it!"
"Hey, I'm the one who's going to defeat him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……良かった、まだ皆元気そうだ」
「謙信も心配だったのでしょうけど、
うちの子達も謙信のことは心配してたから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "our kids were worried about Kenshin too,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔を出してくれて良かったわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "so I'm glad you came to see us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信のことばかり言ってたから」
心配してくれていたのか」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not a bear, I'm a tiger!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がおー！　ほら、がおー！」
「ちょっと静かにしてなさい！」
照れ隠しに咳払いをしてから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After clearing her throat to hide her embarrassment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 改めて勝子が謙信に向き直る。
「謙信様、ご心配をおかけして申し訳ありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Kenshin, I apologize for causing you worry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お会い出来たことも嬉しく思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am also glad to have been able to meet you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですが、どうか、謙信様は謙信様の戦いを」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But please, Lord Kenshin, fight your own battle."
